description:
Tree works in front and rear gardens.  Works: 

 Trees are listed according to specification dated 25th July 2002. 

 G1:   Holly:  Fell, subject to replacement with alternative       species. T5:   Plane:  lift lowest trailers to at least seven metres       above ground. T6:   Plane:  lift lowest trailers to at least seven metres       above ground. T8:   Cherry:  Reduce lateral spread from building and over       road. T11:  Sycamore:  Crown reduce to previous cutting points. T12:  Apple:  Lightly prune and reshape. T13:  Plane:  Repollard.  Clean stem of epicormic growth. T14:  Plane:  Repollard.  Clean stem of epicormic growth.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Within 12 calendar months of the removal of the tree a replacement tree shall be planted of an appropriate species and size agreed with the Local Planning Authority and in an agreed position to British Standard 4428: 1969 'General Landscape Operations'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
